name: Monster Trux: Offroad
overview: It's time to let the monsters loose! Monster Trux Extreme – Off Road Edition puts you in the driving seat of awesome, huge wheeled, monstrous machines and lets you loose in the countryside. Features: - Choose from 8 seriously hardcore Monster Trucks and burn your way around quarries, canyons and mines and in a variety of weather conditions. - Earn prize money to unlock hidden extras, including even bigger trucks, extra challenges, upgrades, extra courses and much more. - Be careful though, every time your vehicle takes damage, you will have to pay to repair your vehicle with your valuable prize money before the next race. - Bump, smash and crash into other drivers to send them off the road, bursting into a flaming hunk of twisted metal. - Utilising the Wii control system to create a heart pounding, bone shaking and extreme four wheeled excitement. - Outstanding single player game modes, including numerous championships and single race challenges. Break the lap record in the Time Trial mode or just take your Monster Machine out for a blast in any of the awesome off road environments. - Challenge your friends in the Multi-player mode, allowing you to compete Head to Head in these awesome machines.
